item.title: MCC mentors Raichur, Maski civic bodies in solid waste management
item.description:
<![CDATA[Ajit Pawar Flight Black Box Probe, Nipah Virus Alert, Economic Survey 2025-26 And More
Mysuru: Mysuru City Corporation (MCC) is mentoring Raichur City Corporation and Maski Town Panchayat in solid waste management.A memorandum of understanding was signed with both the municipal bodies to mentor them under the Union govt's Swachh Shehar Jodi initiative, allowing the mentee civic bodies to learn and replicate best practices of cities with higher rankings on the national cleanliness index.Last...]]>
item.author: Tnn
